mdRecord.dcterms:description: ... built at the request of King Louis XIV of France as a retreat for himself and his maîtresse-en-titre of the time, the Marquise de Montespan, and as a place where he and invited guests could take light meals (collations) away from the strict etiquette of the royal court. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Trianon [work]
